name: zombies-guides
description: Zombies Guides website with automated build system

scripts.build: node build_scripts/add-version-placeholders.js && node build_scripts/nav-builder-improved.js --index ./index.html && node build_scripts/update-version.js
scripts.build:verbose: node build_scripts/add-version-placeholders.js --verbose && node build_scripts/nav-builder-improved.js --verbose && node build_scripts/update-version.js

author: mmmrkennedy
